title: VERBATIM: Africans, Haitians react to 'shithole' comment
text:
VERBATIM: Africans, Haitians react to 'shithole' comment 3:39pm EST - 00:57 
Residents of Haiti, Nigeria and Kenya expressed shock, disgust and disappointment on Friday at reports that U.S. President Donald Trump referred to African states as 'shithole countries'.   
Residents of Haiti, Nigeria and Kenya expressed shock, disgust and disappointment on Friday at reports that U.S. President Donald Trump referred to African states as 'shithole countries'.  //reut.rs/2ATSrBj
